metadata.title: CVE-2011-0590
metadata.description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat 10.x before 10.0.1, 9.x before 9.4.2, and 8.x before 8.2.6 on Windows and Mac OS X allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a 3D file, a different vulnerability than CVE-2011-0591, CVE-2011-0592, CVE-2011-0593, CVE-2011-0595, and CVE-2011-0600.
